1.caption: 2005 NBA All-Star Game
1.description: The 2005 NBA All-Star Game was an exhibition basketball game which was played on February 20, 2005, at Pepsi Center in Denver, Colorado, home of the Denver Nuggets. This game was the 54th edition of the North American National Basketball Association (NBA) All-Star Game and was played during the 2004–05 NBA season.
1.inspected:Announcers: Marv Albert, Doug Collins, Steve KerrKevin Harlan, Steve Kerr, Charles Barkley, Kenny Smith, Magic Johnson and Julius Erving (All-Star Saturday Night)Jim Durham and James Worthy
1.inspected:National anthem: The United States Air Force Academy Choir (American), Tamia (Canada)
1.inspected:Referees: Bill Spooner, Jack Nies, Ken Mauer
